query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(data_as_of) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count, functional_area_type, functional_area_subtype, facility_name WHERE data_as_of>='2022-09-01' GROUP BY functional_area_type, functional_area_subtype, facility_name, month ORDER BY functional_area_type, functional_area_subtype, facility_name, month

column_metadata.description: Month and year of the data record
Type of functional area within the facility
Name of the facility where the functional area is located

table_metadata.title: Functional Areas maintained by Recreation and Parks Department
table_metadata.description: Functional areas maintained by the Recreation and Parks Department, which are physical areas within a facility designated for specific purposes, including recreation and non-recreation facilities.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: City planners, Recreational facility managers, Residents
